personalInfo.name: Oladejo Akinola Idris
personalInfo.occupation: Mathematician Software Engineer, Full-Stack Website Developer, Javascript/Typescript Developer and an Educator.
personalInfo.bio: I am a Mathematician and Software Engineer with over 4 years of experience developing and delivering high-quality web applications. Expertise in a wide range of technologies, including HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, TailwindCSS, Angular, TypeScript, JavaScript, NextJs, Formik, Git, Bitbucket, Ant Design, Angular Material, Node, C#, and SQL and many more.  Proven ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and work independently to meet project deadlines. Passionate about building user-friendly and scalable software solutions. I am practically good and want to keep on getting better everyday
